name: Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters Gift Card
description:
Give the gift of great coffee with the Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters Gift Card! Whether it's a birthday, anniversary, or just a thoughtful gesture, this digital gift card is perfect for any coffee enthusiast.

Key Features:

  • Flexibility: Redeemable on all products at Blue Tokai, including freshly roasted coffee beans, brewing equipment, merchandise, and more.
  • Customizable Amounts: Available in various denominations to suit your gifting needs.
  • Hassle-Free: Delivered instantly via email, ready to use at checkout.

Why Choose Blue Tokai?

Blue Tokai is India’s leading specialty coffee brand, offering the finest beans sourced directly from sustainable farms. With a range of single-origin coffees and blends, the recipient is sure to find their perfect brew.

Surprise your loved ones with the gift of premium coffee today!

Terms and conditions 

  • Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters(BTCR) GIFT CARD is issued to be redeemed at BTCR App and Website.
  • BTCR GIFT CARD will be valid for 1-year to redeem from date of purchase.
  • The amount in BTCR can be redeemed on all types of orders on BTCR app and website.
  • The amount cannot be taken out/transferred from BTCR Wallet.
  • Use of BTCR Wallet will be subject to terms and conditions available at https://cdn.razorpay.com/static/assets/wallet/tncs.pdf
  • The amount can be used on multiple transactions on BTCR app and website.
  • No returns and no refunds on gift cards, e-gift cards and gift vouchers.
  • A GIFT CARD can be redeemed multiple times.
  • No cash payment will be made by the company for the Gift card either in part or in full nor exchanged.
  • In case the value of the service exceeds the value of the Gift card, the difference must be paid by other available payment modes.
  • No cancellation and No refund money are allowed on the issued Gift card.
  • Any unspent amount available in the Gift Card after the card expires shall stand forfeited.
  • BTCR does not accept any responsibility if the customer loses/misplaces the gift card. No duplicate card will be issued either.
  • E-Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 24 - 48 hours. For enquiries or complaints email at getcoffee@bluetokaicoffee.com.

Steps to Redeem

App

  • Access Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters(BTCR) Wallet from the account section in BTCR App
  • You will then land on the BTCR wallet tab. Click on “Redeem Gift Card” button.
  • Enter your 10-digit gift card number and 4-digit PIN, press “Redeem”.
  • BTCR validates the code and adds the denomination to your BTCR wallet account.

Website

  • Enter your 10-digit gift card number and 4-digit PIN, press “Redeem” at the checkout page.
  • Enter amount fully or partially to redeem from the GIFT CARD.

Expiry

  • One year from date of purchase.
